message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering you face 5% inflation per round, so accepting now is better than waiting.

I understand your position, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with a 60-40 split. Let's be a bit more equitable. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor, considering the inflation I'll face in future rounds. What do you think?
Bob, let's meet in the middle. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. With your 5% inflation per round, delaying further will only reduce the real value of your share. This is a fair compromise.
